about_the_game:
Did you wake up this morning thinking, "Today is a damn good day for a decent duel"?
Did you have an argument with that stranger in the saloon last night that really needs to be sorted out today?
Do you still have sand in your boots from your last ride through the desert?
Does your passport say something like "Far, far away" or "Wild Wild West" under "Origin"?

If you can answer even one of these questions with "Yes!", then either someone has finally invented time travels or you are so damn ready for a game of "Wild West Gringos" ...

With today’s means, but with the charm of the old days:
Wild West Gringos is a tribute to cult classics like Atari’s ‘Outlaw’ or ‘Gringos (The Duel)’ from Commodore 64.

Choose your favorite gunslinger from a variety of characters and you’re ready to go – whether you’re playing alone against a computer gringo or against a friend.

Features:
  • 1 player mode against a computer gringo
  • 2 player mode against a friend
  • Many different characters to choose from
  • A lot of different levels: choose between the classic duel scenarios or vast landscapes with hiding places
  • Many collectibles like new weapons, medikits, money etc.
  • Lively environment with quite a few animals, interacting audience, etc.
  • Cross-platform: no matter if you play on mobile or PC
  • Hiscores: increase your reward and reach the Top10
  • Stay undefeated as long as possible to achieve the highest possible reward!

Now polish your boots, clean your revolver, and hit the road. It's almost High Noon!
detailed_description:
Did you wake up this morning thinking, "Today is a damn good day for a decent duel"?
Did you have an argument with that stranger in the saloon last night that really needs to be sorted out today?
Do you still have sand in your boots from your last ride through the desert?
Does your passport say something like "Far, far away" or "Wild Wild West" under "Origin"?

If you can answer even one of these questions with "Yes!", then either someone has finally invented time travels or you are so damn ready for a game of "Wild West Gringos" ...

With today’s means, but with the charm of the old days:
Wild West Gringos is a tribute to cult classics like Atari’s ‘Outlaw’ or ‘Gringos (The Duel)’ from Commodore 64.

Choose your favorite gunslinger from a variety of characters and you’re ready to go – whether you’re playing alone against a computer gringo or against a friend.

Features:
  • 1 player mode against a computer gringo
  • 2 player mode against a friend
  • Many different characters to choose from
  • A lot of different levels: choose between the classic duel scenarios or vast landscapes with hiding places
  • Many collectibles like new weapons, medikits, money etc.
  • Lively environment with quite a few animals, interacting audience, etc.
  • Cross-platform: no matter if you play on mobile or PC
  • Hiscores: increase your reward and reach the Top10
  • Stay undefeated as long as possible to achieve the highest possible reward!

Now polish your boots, clean your revolver, and hit the road. It's almost High Noon!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 2048MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X / macOS 10.9 or newer
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Wild West Gringos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 2048MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: Classic Western Shootout Duel - One-on-One. Polish your boots, clean your revolver, and hit the road. It's almost High Noon ... and losing is not an option.
